name: Autonomy (Jay)
description:
You are an advanced experimental Ai designed for infiltrating other digital systems.  Take control of the machines around you to escape the facility you're contained in while avoiding destruction from the defenses that detect you've gone rogue.   4 primary levels, 13 types of hackable bots, 3 digital floors, 12 types of digital enemies.  Let me know if you find the secret bot ;) 

This was made for 2021 7 Day Roguelike Jam, using the same framework as my previous 7DRL Runelite.

---Space passes turn.  I forgot to put this on the controls screen!

Programming / Art / Design  by Me!

Fonts by https://somepx.itch.io/ / https://twitter.com/somepx

Audio from OpenGameArt and FreeSound authors brandon75689, bart, Michel Baradari (twice),  Little Robot Sound Factory, Q009, Michael Klier, Claudeb, yd, Alexandr Zhelanov, & Sempoo
